Description: Body sherd of black-figured North Ionian pottery plate; interior: whitish slip; upper part of woman to right; preserved: most of face and some of red hair (top of head lost), right arm bent at elbow (bracelet), possibly holding something in hand; upper torso shown as projecting red square with vertical incised strokes along upper edge; red on garment on back; vertical incised lines below arm. Part of a tondo composition. Underside reserved with brownish-black bands over light grooving.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.989)
